title: Lear's chain mail
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|A chain mail made of pure gold.}} [[File:Lear's_chain_mail.png]] '''''A chainmail armour''''' ''[with a randomized appearance]'' -1 [[chain mail]] [[Cursed]]
-3 [[dexterity]]
Prevents spellcasting ==Desirability== Obviously none, although '''Lear's chain mail''' is nowhere near as bad as the [[robe of Misfortune]] or [[robe of Folly|Folly]]. Unfortunately, you may find yourself stuck with it if you are trying on unknown randart chain mails. Always carry a [[scroll of remove curse]] when wearing unknown artefacts! ==History== *Lear's chain mail was removed in [[0.13]]. [[Lear's hauberk]] was introduced in its place.
